name: A Janitor's Routine
description:
Do your best at the best job of your life !!

You're a janitor in the land of fun, an arcade. Unfortunately, some brats and fucking skinheads would like you to smile more... You'll have to survive each and every day with your trustworthy broom and coins-filled hoover !

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Right-Click - Broom Strike

Left-click - Shoot a Coin

Credits to :

GLM : Code, Design

Me : Graphics, Sound Design, Music, Design

Erik Satie : "Gymnopédie No. 1" music sheet

Made during the Video Games Lab Game Jam 2021 (we got last minute webgl export issues lol)
